title: Wildlife Impact Assessment
description: An environmental consultant needs to assess the potential impact of a new solar project on local wildlife, particularly protected bird species.

tasks.description: Query federal and state databases to identify all protected or endangered species known to inhabit the project area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a list of 3 protected bird species.

tasks.description: Analyze the project layout to determine its proximity to critical habitats or migratory routes identified for these species.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the project site is adjacent to a known migratory flyway.

tasks.description: Recommend mitigation measures, such as adjusting the project boundary, using bird-friendly materials, and post-construction monitoring.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a list of actionable mitigation strategies.
